#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        while(n!=1)
        {   if(n%2==0)
            n=n/2;
            else
                break;
        }
        if(n==1)
            cout<<"BKUL"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"BMEENA"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
